detail_desc: Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with frills on the sleeves.
Jacket in a checked felted wool blend in a straight, slightly shorter style. Collar, zip down the front, two zipped side pockets, an inner pocket and long sleeves with a button at the cuffs. Lined.
5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and tapered legs.

Down jacket in nylon with a light sheen and lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip down the front, side pockets and an elasticated drawstring at the rounded hem. Lined. Filling 90% down, 10% feathers.

Down jacket in nylon with a light sheen and lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip down the front, side pockets and an elasticated drawstring at the rounded hem. Lined. Filling 90% down, 10% feathers.

Down jacket in nylon with a light sheen and lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip down the front, side pockets and an elasticated drawstring at the rounded hem. Lined. Filling 90% down, 10% feathers.

Shirt in airy cotton poplin in a straight style with a gently tapered waist, turn-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem.

Straight-cut, checked shirt in an airy cotton-blend weave with wool and viscose. Relaxed fit with a turn-down collar, classic front and gently tapered waist. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs.
5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and gently tapered legs.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in raw denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly with a button and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red and white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.

Trousers in soft, brushed wool twill with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with creases.

Trousers in soft, brushed wool twill with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with creases.
Top in a soft, gently draping silk and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in a soft, gently draping silk and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Soft, non-wired jersey bra with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and no fasteners. Lined.
Soft, non-wired jersey bra with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and no fasteners. Lined.
V-neck, long-sleeved jumper in boiled wool in a straight-cut relaxed fit with ribbing around the neckline cuffs and hem.
V-neck, long-sleeved jumper in boiled wool in a straight-cut relaxed fit with ribbing around the neckline cuffs and hem.
Short fitted dress in glittery patterned velour with an opening and button at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and a seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton twill linings, leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton twill linings, leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton twill linings, leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.

Stretch cotton twill cargo joggers in a relaxed fit with a zip fly and button and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, back pockets and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud, and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Stretch cotton twill cargo joggers in a relaxed fit with a zip fly and button and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, back pockets and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud, and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Stretch cotton twill cargo joggers in a relaxed fit with a zip fly and button and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, back pockets and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud, and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Printed stretch velour trousers with an elasticated waist and flared legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with an overlocked frill trim at the top and narrow ties at the sides. Low waist.
Short, straight-cut dress in sequined mesh with ribbing around the neckline, short sleeves and appliqués front and back. Jersey lining.
